org.ldaptive.handler
Class AbstractLdapEntryHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.ldaptive.handler.AbstractLdapEntryHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
LdapEntryHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CaseChangeEntryHandler, DnAttributeEntryHandler, MergeAttributeEntryHandler, RecursiveEntryHandler
public abstract class AbstractLdapEntryHandler
extends Object
implements LdapEntryHandler

Base class for entry handlers which simply returns values unaltered.

Version:
$Revision: 2287 $ $Date: 2012-02-27 11:44:39 -0500 (Mon, 27 Feb 2012) $
Author:
Middleware Services
